Autumnal Winds And Times Of Yore

wikitext.*:
'''Lord Lovidicus''' is an American Dungeon Synth musician, and has released 17 albums<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://lordlovidicus.bandcamp.com/music|articlename=lord lovidicus music|website=bandcamp|accessed=1 July 2025}}</ref> since 2009. Most of his music has no vocals, but a few of the songs and titles are named after events and characters in the Sillmarillion and Lord of the Rings.





=Discography= 
*Windbuchen(2009)
*''[[Journey To Beleriand - EP]]''(2010)
*''[[Quenta Silmarillion(album)|Quenta Silmarillion]]''(2010)
*Trolldom(2010)
*''[[The Forges Fire - EP]]''(2010)
*''[[Daulu Bûrz-Ishi]]''(2010)
*Arcane(2010)
*''[[The Stars Reflect An Ancient Magic]]''(2011)
*When The Mountain Falls - EP(2012)
*''[[Autumnal Winds And Times Of Yore]]''(2013)
*Forgotten ruins(2013)
*Kyndill og Steinn(2013)
*Wandervogel des Waldes(2014)
*''[[Book Of Lore - Vol. I]]''(2015)
*Book Of Lore - Vol. II: A Vespera, Ad Lucem(2016)
*Saeculorum(2018)
*Midsummer(2020)
